sentences.en: Girl painful twist of the body, a wry face, not to blubber out.
sentences.cn: 小姑娘疼得扭动着身子, 扭歪了脸, 不让自己大声哭出来.

sentences.en: Hardly blubber , the energy - using tissue turns out to be one step away from muscle.
sentences.cn: 棕色脂肪与脂肪有很大差别, 它是一种消耗能量的组织,距离肌肉仅一步之遥.

sentences.en: Hollow hairs and a thick layer of blubber ( fat ) also keep out the cold.
sentences.cn: 中空的体毛和厚厚的脂肪层也能帮助抵御严寒.

sentences.en: It is for the valuable oil in blubber that whales are hunted.
sentences.cn: 恰恰为了从鲸脂中获得有价值的油,鲸鱼遭到捕猎.

sentences.en: Once whales wear hunted for whale - bone as well as for blubber.
sentences.cn: 曾经有一段时期,捕鲸不仅仅是为了它的鲸脂,也为了它的骨头.

sentences.en: Polar bears prefer eating blubber to meat.
sentences.cn: 对于北极熊来说,鲸的脂脂比肉更有吸引力.

sentences.en: She started to blubber like a child.
sentences.cn: 她开始像个小孩似的放声大哭。

sentences.en: The baby whale develops a thick layer of blubber to protect it from the cold sea.
sentences.cn: 幼鲸长出一层厚厚的鲸脂，以抵御寒冷的海水。

sentences.en: The blubber rendered down into oil.
The bolt, when shot into the whale , would excise a plug of skin and blubber.
sentences.cn: 箭一旦射中蓝鲸, 就会带下一小块皮肤和鲸脂的样品.

sentences.en: The thick fat, or blubber, under the whale's skin protects the animal against cold waters.
sentences.cn: 厚厚的脂肪, 或者说是鲸脂, 在鲸鱼的皮下用于保护它,去抵御寒冷的海水.

sentences.en: The whale blubber is rendered down to make oil.
The whale is rich in blubber.
Walrus populations were in serious decline during centuries of wholesale slaughter for their blubber and tusks.
sentences.cn: 几个世纪以来,为获取海象脂和獠牙,人们成批捕杀海象,使海象数量严重减少.

sentences.en: Who cry me a river , blubber - tooth tiger. Have some fun.
sentences.cn: 你管我干嘛,胆小虎, 玩一下嘛.

trans.tran_cn: 鲸脂， 鲸油，啜泣，哽咽
trans.tran_en: the fat of sea animals, especially  whale s
